text: Midnight Madness is a 1980 comedy movie from Walt Disney Productions, starring David Naughton. The movie is about a group of college students who participate in an all night puzzle solving race. It is Michael J. Fox's first film role. The movie did not do well in theaters and many critics did not like it. However, the movie has gained a cult following, and has been the inspiration for many real-life puzzle and alternate reality games. ==Related pages== *It's a Mad Mad Mad Mad World *The Last of Sheila *Scavenger Hunt *Million Dollar Mystery *Rat Race ==Other websites== * * * * *Fagabeefe: An unofficial fan page devoted to the film * Another website about the movie *Roger Ebert's 1980 review *Comprehensive Synopsis/Review at 3B Theater *DVD review at Digitally Obsessed *Hot Springs, Arkansas's 2006 Midnight Madness *Midnight Madness Brevard County, Florida Category:1980 movies Category:Disney movies Category:English-language movies
title: Midnight Madness
